episode.title: No False Humidity
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest: Jason Snell. Topics: Headset, headseat, headset. And no baseball talk other than how games might look in VR. Also: Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro for iPad, and GM's dumb decision to drop CarPlay.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest: Jason Snell. Topics: Headset, headseat, headset. And no baseball talk other than how games might look in VR. Also: Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro for iPad, and GM's dumb decision to drop CarPlay.

Sponsored by:

  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Use code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
  • Kolide: Cross-platform endpoint security solution for teams that value privacy and transparency.
  • Backblaze: Makes backing up and accessing your data astonishingly easy.

Links:

  • Will Carroll at Under the Knife, speculating on how Apple could revolutionize sports broadcasting in VR.
  • Steve Jobs introducing the original iPhone.
  • Jason on the new Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro apps for iPad.
  • Me ranting about GM dropping CarPlay.
  • Mac versions of Apple’s iWork apps lost features in 2013 for compatibility with iOS versions.
  • ‘Ford CEO Jim Farley Seems Very Happy That GM Is Dropping CarPlay’.
  • My wife’s photo from our seats at Celtics-Sixers game 6.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
